field.name: description
field.value:
Items that have to be documented for the release:
-Adding info to create and used named queries with assembly attributes. -Improving information on using SQL queries (done) -Using custom tuplizers with AR/NH2.1 -Updating configuration to include ByteCode provider -declare the setters of id fields as private in code -default-flushing behaviour -Update testing docs so that in-memory-testing is included -IsOverride-Property on attributes.
